org.sakaiproject.genericdao.util
Class ThreadboundConnectionsDataSourceWrapper

java.lang.Object
  org.sakaiproject.genericdao.util.ThreadboundConnectionsDataSourceWrapper
All Implemented Interfaces:
DataSource
public class ThreadboundConnectionsDataSourceWrapper
extends Object
implements DataSource

This will bind the connections coming out of this dataSource to the current thread so there is only one connection per thread

Author:
Aaron Zeckoski (azeckoski @ gmail.com)

Constructor Summary
ThreadboundConnectionsDataSourceWrapper(DataSource dataSource)
          Create a new data-source wrapper, auto-commit is set to false for all connections fed out of this datasource
ThreadboundConnectionsDataSourceWrapper(DataSource dataSource, boolean autoCommitConnection)
          Create a new data-source wrapper
 
Method Summary
 void clearConnection()
          This will close the current thread-bound connection (if there is one) and then clear the threadlocal, it is ok to call this multiple times
